original_title: El niño que habla con las estrellas
overview: After the death of his mother, the only thing Daniel has to remember her is a photo and a story about a lost child who returns home thanks to a guiding star. One night a star appears before Daniel and tells him that he will take him back to his mother. Daniel trusts the star and they both enter the darkness of night.
title: The Boy Who Speaks to the Stars
